<!-- source-hash: 508c8ee0b78471d31ce9d33a2b15d0e4 -->
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) that encapsulates API key configuration details for external tool integrations, providing structured response data for tool authentication setup.

## Key Components

- **ToolApiKeyResponse**: Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter generation
- **key**: The actual API key value (e.g., bearer token, secret key)
- **type**: Authentication type specification (e.g., "BEARER_TOKEN", "API_KEY")
- **keyName**: The header or parameter name used for the API key (e.g., "Authorization", "X-API-Key")

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a tool API key response
ToolApiKeyResponse apiKeyConfig = ToolApiKeyResponse.builder()
    .key("sk-1234567890abcdef")
    .type("BEARER_TOKEN")
    .keyName("Authorization")
    .build();

// Using in a REST controller
@GetMapping("/tools/{toolId}/api-key")
public ResponseEntity<ToolApiKeyResponse> getToolApiKey(@PathVariable Long toolId) {
    ToolApiKeyResponse response = toolService.getApiKeyConfiguration(toolId);
    return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
}

// Accessing properties
String authHeader = response.getKeyName(); // "Authorization"
String tokenType = response.getType();     // "BEARER_TOKEN"
String token = response.getKey();          // "sk-1234567890abcdef"
```
